scripts.dev: npm run db:sqlite && prisma generate && next dev
scripts.build: npm run db:sqlite && prisma generate && next build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.migrate:dev: npm run db:sqlite && prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:reset: npm run db:sqlite && prisma migrate reset
scripts.migrate:deploy: npm run db:postgres && prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:push:sqlite: npm run db:sqlite && prisma db push
scripts.db:push:postgres: npm run db:postgres && prisma db push
scripts.vercel-build: npm run db:postgres && prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && next build
scripts.dev:pg: npm run db:postgres && prisma generate && prisma migrate dev && next dev
scripts.build:pg: npm run db:postgres && prisma generate && next build
scripts.migrate:pg: npm run db:postgres && prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:deploy:pg: npm run db:postgres && prisma migrate deploy
scripts.seed: prisma db push && prisma db seed
scripts.seed:sqlite: npm run db:sqlite && cross-env DATABASE_URL="file:./dev.db" npm run seed
scripts.seed:pg: npm run db:postgres && npm run seed
scripts.dev:pg:reset: npm run pg:up && npm run db:postgres && prisma migrate reset --force && prisma db seed && next dev
scripts.dev:sqlite:reset: npm run db:sqlite && prisma migrate reset --force && prisma db seed && next dev
